short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the TubeDiary extension to automatically track your YouTube video consumption.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By installing the TubeDiary Chrome extension, the YouTube videos you watch will be automatically logged to your account on TubeDiary.com

Top Features

ğŸ“Š Comprehensive YouTube Consumption Tracking

â˜‘ï¸ Automated Logging: The TubeDiary Chrome extension runs in the background to provide seamless tracking of title, channel, and length of the YouTube videos you watch.
â˜‘ï¸ Consumption Awareness: Gain accountability for your weekly YouTube usage, promoting more conscious and intentional content consumption.  
 
ğŸ“š Enhanced Learning and Reflection

â˜‘ï¸ AI-Powered Summaries: Each video logged in your TubeDiary is accompanied by a concise ChatGPT AI-generated summary, helping you quickly recall key points.
â˜‘ï¸ Interactive Checkboxes: Mark videos with checkboxes to indicate which video you've applied in your life or work, enhancing active engagement.
â˜‘ï¸Note-Taking: Add personal notes to any video entry, allowing for deeper reflection and customized insights.

ğŸ› ï¸ Content Management and Personalization

â˜‘ï¸ Favorite Button: Easily favorite videos to activate spaced repetition, reminding you to review notes or rewatch important content.
â˜‘ï¸ Tag Cloud: See an automatic visual representation of your interests based on the channels you watch to help you identify trends over time.
â˜‘ï¸ Content Curation: Over time, better curate what you watch, focusing on content that adds value to your learning and development.

ğŸ“¤ Sharing and Expanding Beyond YouTube

â˜‘ï¸ Public Sharing: Generate a unique public URL to share your TubeDiary with friends, showcasing your favorite videos and insights.
â˜‘ï¸ Cross-Platform Logging: Use the provided bookmarklet to manually log videos from other video sites, expanding your diary beyond YouTube.

ğŸ’» User-Friendly Interface

â˜‘ï¸ Simple Installation: Easy setup with the TubeDiary Chrome extension, which integrates smoothly into your browsing experience.
â˜‘ï¸ Accessible Insights: Blue tooltips next to videos allow for quick note additions, making insights readily available when needed.

In short, TubeDiary transforms your YouTube consumption into a powerful tool for enhanced learning, smarter decision-making, and proactive application of valuable content.
